text: Out of the corner of my eye, I spot 'em.
Two pairs of glowing eyes peering from the darkness of the side closet.
For the imposters that have been terrorizing the city, they’re rather cowardly.
Hey, I know you’re in there. Open up.
speaker: det

text: As I say that, the closet opens and I see two kittens holding each other up in a trenchcoat.
You’re the ones messing with the town?!?
speaker: det

text: I don’t know what you’re talking about sir, we’re just helping investigate stuff around the city...
speaker: sussy

text: Shut up, bro! Isn’t that like, self incrimination or something?
speaker: sussy

text: ... Isn’t that what you just did? Most people don’t bring up self incrimination unless you have something to hide!
speaker: sussy

text: I see the lower cat elbow the upper cat.
Who are you, mister?
speaker: sussy

text: My name is Dick Johnson. PI.
speaker: det

text: I flash my card. As I do so, the upper cat’s eyes widen and shines, a childlike grin sprouting on his face.
The lower cat looks similarly amazed, and looks away upon meeting my steel gaze,
So... what brings you here today, sir?
speaker: sussy

text: You can drop the act, I know you two did this.
speaker: det

text: What did we do? We’ve been here just um... enjoying this cake we bought.
speaker: sussy

text: Yeah! Anyway sir,  do you like, solve cases and stuff?
speaker: sussy

text: Yeah. I’m solving a case of a wannabe detective who’s been scamming clients and stealing cakes.
speaker: det

text: You’ve got nothin on us!
speaker: sussy

text: Scram!!
speaker: sussy

text: The hat the imposter wore is right there.
speaker: det

text: I point to the cowboy hat with emphasis.
And the cake that was taken was right there.
speaker: det

text: My gaze trails cooly to the cake.
Then it shifts until I look at the lower cat’s feet.
She didn’t clean off the cake from when she stepped in it at the bakery.
They both follow my gaze and freeze once they notice the incriminating cake bits beneath them.
I think he knows...
speaker: sussy

text: Yeah...
speaker: sussy

text: So what’s gonna happen now, sir? A-are we under arrest?
speaker: sussy

text: Nope. What you’re gonna do is apologize to everyone you inconvenienced.
And you’ll go clean up the graffiti on Natieks home.
speaker: det

text: Who??
speaker: sussy

text: ... The lizard lady that asked you to investigate who graffitied her house.
speaker: det

text: Ooh, her. Yeah, we were trying to help investigate by checking out the bar.
speaker: sussy

text: But then we got thirsty and asked for a drink but the guy at the bar said no!
speaker: sussy

text: And then we got hungry and then we saw this pretty slug lady and I wanted to eat it with her
and then we went to get some cake and then we went to ask the lady and she said no a-
speaker: sussy

text: Hey, chill out man.
speaker: sussy

text: I’ve already pieced that together.
speaker: det

text: Yeah. My only question is why?
speaker: det

text: Why go out of your way to pretend to be an investigator?
speaker: det

text: Because Mom said so? We all watched a movie about a man that investigated a missing person!
Before she went out to work at the bakery’s other business, she said to go play detective while she was gone.
speaker: sussy

text: Wait, what busin-
speaker: det

text: Anyway, we went trying to find people to help, but they wouldn’t take us seriously unless
we looked like detectives so we scrounged up some stuff around the house for our outfit.
speaker: sussy

text: We really did wanna help folks, mister! We just got a bit distracted...
speaker: sussy

text: I see. Well you still really inconvenienced people and I’ll have to take you in to apologize.
speaker: det

text: But you two are pretty crafty. Pretty quick too.
speaker: det

text: ... Hey, when this is all resolved and when you’ve been properly trained, would you be interested in becoming my interns- no, sidekicks?
I could use some extra hands in expanding the business.
speaker: det

text: Would I ever! Sis, we could be the real deal!
speaker: sussy

text: The lower cat tries to hide her smile but it’s clear as day that she’s ecstatic about the offer.
Yeah sure, that’d be cool I guess. I’d do it if you begged me.
speaker: sussy

text: I could always find someone else if you're not interested...
speaker: det

text: No!!
speaker: sussy

text: I mean, uh no, I’ll do it. Please.
speaker: sussy

text: Heh. We’ll talk about it later.
For now, we’re gonna get you two back to the bar so you can apologize to your client.
speaker: det
